title: Crime Alert 10.23.18
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.23.18
description:
A married New York teacher texts an 11 year-old student 500 times, calling him her "boyfriend." A man thought involved in the death of Jamal Khashoggi is seen leaving the Saudi consulate in Khashoggi's clothes.  A woman who fractured her spine escaping a sex assault is set to run the New York marathon.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
